titleStmt.title: An occasional dialogue at a coffee-house, between Philanax Britannicus, and Calophilus Anglus, two loyal English gentlemen, sincere lovers of justice, truth, and their nations honour / authore Coffo-Philo.
titleStmt.author: Carr, William.

notesStmt.note: Coffo-Philo is a pseudonym for William Carr.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
